info.title: Prisma Postgres Management API
info.description: REST API for managing Prisma Postgres projects, databases, backups, and workspaces.

404.description: Database with the given ID was not found.

delete.description: Deletes the database connection string with the given ID.

200.description: Returned the database with the given ID.

404.description: Database with the given ID was not found.

get.description: Returns the database with the given ID.

404.description: Database with the given ID was not found.

delete.description: Deletes the database with the given ID.

200.description: Returned all connections for the given database.

get.description: Returns all connections for the given database.

200.description: Created a new connection string for the database.

404.description: Database with the given ID was not found.

post.description: Creates a new connection string for the given database.

200.description: Returned backups for the given database.

404.description: Database with the given ID was not found.

422.description: Remote database backups are not supported

get.description: Returns backups for the specified database.

200.description: Returned usage metrics for the given database.

404.description: Database with the given ID was not found.

schema.description: Start date for metrics query. Defaults to start of current month if not provided.
End date for metrics query. Will be set to end of day if a future date is provided. Defaults to current date if not provided.

get.description: Returns usage metrics for the specified database.
Returns the list of projects the token has access to.

post.summary: Create project with a postgres database
post.description: Creates a new project with a postgres database.

400.description: Project cannot be deleted due to existing dependencies.

404.description: Project with the specified ID was not found

delete.description: Deletes the project with the given ID.

404.description: Project with the specified ID was not found.

get.description: Returns the project with the given ID.

404.description: Project with the given ID was not found.

post.description: Transfer the project with the given ID to the new owner's workspace

200.description: Returned the databases for the given project ID.

404.description: Project with the given ID was not found.

get.description: Returns databases for the given project.

201.description: Created a new database for the project.

400.description: The request is invalid due to missing or invalid parameters.

403.description: Project does not belong to the service tokens workspace.

post.description: Creates a new database for the given project.

200.description: Returned the integrations for the given workspace ID.

404.description: Workspace with the given ID was not found.

get.description: Returns integrations for the given workspace.

404.description: Integration with the given client ID was not found.

delete.description: Revokes the integration tokens with the given client ID.

200.description: Returns all available regions for Prisma Postgres.

get.description: Returns all available regions for Prisma Postgres.

200.description: Returns all available regions for Prisma Accelerate.

get.description: Returns all available regions for Prisma Accelerate.

200.description: Returns the list of workspaces the current token can access.

get.description: Returns the list of workspaces the current token can access.
